title: You can now book hotels on PhonePe as EaseMyTrip partners fintech app
description: EaseMyTrip has partnered with fintech platform PhonePe to launch its 'Hotels' segment on the payment app. PhonePe users can now access domestic and international hotels with special offers, competitive pricing, and flexible booking options. Future plans include integrating 'Activities' and 'Cabs' features to enhance the travel experience for users.
